title: Set New Password
subtitle: Your new password must be different from previously used passwords.

invalidToken.title: Invalid Link
invalidToken.description: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
invalidToken.instruction: Please request a new password reset link.

success.title: Password Reset Successfully!
success.description: Your password has been successfully reset.
success.redirectMessage: You will be redirected to the login page in a moment...

toast.invalidLinkDescription: The password reset link is invalid or expired
toast.resetSuccessDescription: You can now login with your new password
toast.resetFailedDescription: Please try again or request a new reset link
